name: Skeleball
description:
-------------------------------------------

Instructions:

Use space or left mouse button to reach the white balls.
Avoid the red ones.
Keep eating white balls before the inner ring fills or you will die.

Pay attention! 
Whenever the skull's outer ring fills up the balls will swap colors.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

done for the minimalistic game jam.
